meanings.definition: A deformity of the toe in which the joint is permanently bent downward.
meanings.sent1: My grandma has a hammertoe on her pinky toe.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that a hammertoe can cause discomfort when wearing shoes.
meanings.sent3: At the funny party, everyone wore fake hammertoes on their fingers for a laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her hammertoe was like a stubborn little hook, refusing to straighten.
meanings.sent5: The image of a hammertoe stuck in my mind like a crooked nail.

meanings.definition: To have a hammertoe is to have a toe that is permanently bent downward.
meanings.sent1: I hammertoe when I stub my toe against the bed frame.
meanings.sent2: She hammertoes due to wearing tight shoes for too long.
meanings.sent3: The cat hammertoes its tail when it's feeling playful.
meanings.sent4: He hammertoes his fingers to show off his flexibility.
meanings.sent5: The tree hammertoes its branches towards the ground in a graceful arc.
